nodes.text: Golga Besadii Fir was the brief final Hutt ambassador to the New Republic.

He was assigned to the Hutt consulate on Coruscant by the time of the Yuuzhan Vong War. When the Hutts allied with the extragalactic Yuuzhan Vong, Golga began to make preparations to leave Coruscant for Nal Hutta. It was at this point he received a visit from New Republic Senator Viqi Shesh who the Hutt imagined what she would look like as a dancer.
The Senator hoped to pass informal intelligence to the Hutts of New Republic assets in the hope that this disinformation would be passed to the Hutt's Yuuzhan Vong allies.
Although a member of the Besadii clan, he had Desilijic blood in him, which was possibly the reason he found Human women attractive.
